pli-tv-kd14:4.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena jātiyā sattavassena arahattaṃ sacchikataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.3: Yaṃ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ sabbaṃ tena anuppattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.4: Natthi cassa kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.5: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.7: Yaṃ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ sabbaṃ mayā anuppattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.8: Natthi ca me kiñci uttarikaraṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.9: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ saṃghassa veyyāvaccaṃ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.10: Atha kho āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.1.11: “yannūnāhaṃ saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṃ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.5: Yaṃ kiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ mayā anuppattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.6: Natthi ca me kiñci uttarikaraṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayo.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.7: Kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ saṃghassa veyyāvaccaṃ kareyyan’ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.9: ‘yannūnāhaṃ saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapeyyaṃ bhattāni ca uddiseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.10: Icchāmahaṃ, bhante, saṃghassa senāsanañca paññāpetuṃ bhattāni ca uddisitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.12: Tena hi tvaṃ, dabba, saṃghassa senāsanañca paññapehi bhattāni ca uddisāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.2.13: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā dabbo mallaputto bhagavato paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.2: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannatu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.5: Yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.7: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.10: Saṃgho āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ senāsanapaññāpakañca bhattuddesakañca sammannati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.11: Yassāyasmato khamati āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa senāsanapaññāpakassa ca bhattuddesakassa ca sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.13: Sammato saṃghena āyasmā dabbo mallaputto senāsanapaññāpako ca bhattuddesako ca.
pli-tv-kd14:4.3.14: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.1: Sammato ca panāyasmā dabbo mallaputto sabhāgānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.2: Ye te bhikkhū suttantikā tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.4: Ye te bhikkhū vinayadharā tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.6: Ye te bhikkhū dhammakathikā tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.8: Ye te bhikkhū jhāyino tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.10: Ye te bhikkhū tiracchānakathikā kāyadaḷhibahulā viharanti tesampi ekajjhaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.12: Yepi te bhikkhū vikāle āgacchanti tesampi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā teneva ālokena senāsanaṃ paññapeti;
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.15: Te āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.17: Te āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.20: “amhākaṃ, āvuso dabba, gijjhakūṭe pabbate senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.22: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.23: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, vebhārapasse sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.24: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, sītavane sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre senāsanaṃ paññapehi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.30: Amhākaṃ, āvuso, maddakucchimhi migadāye senāsanaṃ paññapehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.31: Tesaṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā aṅguliyā jalamānāya purato purato gacchati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.32: Tepi teneva ālokena āyasmato dabbassa mallaputtassa piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.33: Tesaṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapeti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.34: “ayaṃ mañco, idaṃ pīṭhaṃ, ayaṃ bhisi, idaṃ bibbohanaṃ, idaṃ vaccaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ passāvaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ pānīyaṃ, idaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ, ayaṃ kattaradaṇḍo, idaṃ saṃghassa katikasaṇṭhānaṃ, imaṃ kālaṃ pavisitabbaṃ, imaṃ kālaṃ nikkhamitabban”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.4.35: Tesaṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto evaṃ senāsanaṃ paññapetvā punadeva veḷuvanaṃ paccāgacchati.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū navakā ceva honti appapuññā ca.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.2: Yāni saṃghassa lāmakāni senāsanāni tāni tesaṃ pāpuṇanti lāmakāni ca bhattāni.
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.3: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe manussā icchanti therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhisaṅkhārikaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dātuṃ—
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.7: Te pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā there bhikkhū pucchanti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.8: “tumhākaṃ, āvuso, bhattagge kiṃ ahosi, tumhākaṃ kiṃ ahosī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.5.10: “amhākaṃ, āvuso, sappi ahosi, telaṃ ahosi, uttaribhaṅgaṃ ahosī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saṃghassa catukkabhattaṃ deti niccabhattaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.3: aññe odanena pucchanti, aññe sūpena pucchanti, aññe telena pucchanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.4: Tena kho pana samayena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṃ svātanāya mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.5: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṃ agamāsi kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.6: So yenāyasmā dabbo mallaputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho kalyāṇabhattikaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā dabbo mallaputto dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.8: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati āyasmatā dabbena mallaputtena dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.9: “kassa, bhante, amhākaṃ ghare svātanāya bhattaṃ uddiṭṭhan”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.10: “Mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ kho, gahapati, bhikkhūnaṃ tumhākaṃ ghare svātanāya bhattaṃ uddiṭṭhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.11: Atha kho kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati anattamano ahosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.12: Kathañhi nāma pāpabhikkhū amhākaṃ ghare bhuñjissantīti gharaṃ gantvā dāsiṃ āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.13: “ye, je, sve bhattikā āgacchanti te koṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.6.14: “Evaṃ, ayyā”ti kho sā dāsī kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino paccassosi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.2: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, amhākaṃ kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino bhattaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.3: sve amhe kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati saputtadāro upatiṭṭhitvā parivisissati;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.4: aññe odanena pucchissanti, aññe sūpena pucchissanti, aññe telena pucchissanti, aññe uttaribhaṅgena pucchissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.5: Te teneva somanassena na cittarūpaṃ rattiyā supiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.6: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kalyāṇabhattikassa gahapatino nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.7: Addasā kho sā dāsī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante;
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.8: disvāna koṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññapetvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.11: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho na tāva bhattaṃ siddhaṃ bhavissati yathā mayaṃ koṭṭhake nisīdāpiyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.12: Atha kho sā dāsī kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena upagañchi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.17: ‘ye, je, sve bhattikā āgacchanti, te koṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññapetvā kaṇājakena bilaṅgadutiyena parivisā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.20: “hiyyo kho, āvuso, kalyāṇabhattiko gahapati ārāmaṃ agamāsi dabbassa mallaputtassa santike.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.21: Nissaṃsayaṃ kho mayaṃ dabbena mallaputtena gahapatino antare paribhinnā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.22: Te teneva domanassena na cittarūpaṃ bhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.7.23: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā ārāmaṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā bahārāmakoṭṭhake saṅghāṭipallatthikāya nisīdiṃsu tuṇhībhūtā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyantā appaṭibhānā.
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.1: Atha kho mettiyā bhikkhunī yena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.5: tatiyampi kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.10: “Tathā hi pana tvaṃ, bhagini, amhe dabbena mallaputtena viheṭhiyamāne ajjhupekkhasī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.12: “Sace kho tvaṃ, bhagini, iccheyyāsi, ajjeva bhagavā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāsāpeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.15: “Ehi tvaṃ, bhagini, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ evaṃ vadehi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.16: ‘idaṃ, bhante, nacchannaṃ nappatirūpaṃ, yāyaṃ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṃ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.20: “Evaṃ, ayyā”ti kho mettiyā bhikkhunī mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.21: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho mettiyā bhikkhunī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.8.22: “idaṃ, bhante, nacchannaṃ nappatirūpaṃ, yāyaṃ, bhante, disā abhayā anītikā anupaddavā sāyaṃ disā sabhayā saītikā saupaddavā;
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.2: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathāyaṃ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.5: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathāyaṃ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.7: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.8: “sarasi tvaṃ, dabba, evarūpaṃ kattā yathāyaṃ bhikkhunī āhā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.13: “Yatohaṃ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.17: Idaṃ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.18: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.19: Atha kho mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū te bhikkhū etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.20: “māvuso, mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsetha, na sā kiñci aparajjhati;
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.21: amhehi sā ussāhitā kupitehi anattamanehi cāvanādhippāyehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.22: “Kiṃ pana tumhe, āvuso, āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsethā”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.24: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.25: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.26: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:4.9.27: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho dabbassa mallaputtassa sativepullappattassa sativinayaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.3: tena, bhikkhave, dabbena mallaputtena saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā, vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā, añjaliṃ paggahetvā, evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.4: ‘ime maṃ, bhante, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.5: Sohaṃ, bhante, sativepullappatto saṃghaṃ sativinayaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.8: ‘ime maṃ, bhante, mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.9: Sohaṃ sativepullappatto tatiyampi, bhante, saṃghaṃ sativinayaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.12: Ime mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:4.10.13: Āyasmā dabbo mallaputto sativepullappatto saṃghaṃ sativinayaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd14:14.16.18: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.21: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikā sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.16.23: Evaṃ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ;

pli-tv-kd14:14.17.2: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchantā antarāmagge sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.8: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.11: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.14: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikā sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.17.16: Evaṃ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.1: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū taṃ āvāsaṃ āgacchantā antarāmagge na sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi, taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā āvāsikā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.2: ‘idaṃ kho, āvuso, adhikaraṇaṃ evaṃ jātaṃ, evaṃ samuppannaṃ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.3: sādhāyasmantā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, yathayidaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ suvūpasantaṃ assā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.4: Sace, bhikkhave, āvāsikā bhikkhū vuḍḍhatarā honti, āgantukā bhikkhū navakatarā, tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.5: ‘iṅgha tumhe, āyasmanto, muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ hotha, yāva mayaṃ mantemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.6: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikā bhikkhū navakatarā honti, āgantukā bhikkhū vuḍḍhatarā, tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.7: ‘tena hi tumhe, āyasmanto, muhuttaṃ idheva tāva hotha, yāva mayaṃ mantemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.8: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mantayamānānaṃ evaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.9: ‘na mayaṃ sakkoma imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanenā’ti, na taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.10: Sace pana, bhikkhave, āvāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mantayamānānaṃ evaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.11: ‘sakkoma mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanenā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.12: Tehi, bhikkhave, āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi āgantukā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.13: ‘sace tumhe, āyasmanto, amhākaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yathājātaṃ yathāsamuppannaṃ ārocessatha, yathā ca mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessāma dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā suvūpasantaṃ bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.15: No ce tumhe, āyasmanto, amhākaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yathājātaṃ yathāsamuppannaṃ ārocessatha, yathā ca mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessāma dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā na suvūpasantaṃ bhavissati, na mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sampaṭicchissāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.16: Evaṃ supariggahitaṃ kho, bhikkhave, katvā āvāsikehi bhikkhūhi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.17: Tehi, bhikkhave, āgantukehi bhikkhūhi āvāsikā bhikkhū evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.18: ‘yathājātaṃ yathāsamuppannaṃ mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ āyasmantānaṃ ārocessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.19: Sace āyasmantā sakkonti ettakena vā ettakena vā antarena imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā suvūpasantaṃ bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.20: Evaṃ mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ āyasmantānaṃ niyyādessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.21: No ce āyasmantā sakkonti ettakena vā ettakena vā antarena imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena tathā na suvūpasantaṃ bhavissati, na mayaṃ imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ āyasmantānaṃ niyyādessāma.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.23: Evaṃ supariggahitaṃ kho, bhikkhave, katvā āgantukehi bhikkhūhi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ āvāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niyyādetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.24: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.18.29: evaṃ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.1: Tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati, anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.3: sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.4: bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpassa dhammā bahussutā honti, dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.5: ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.6: vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṃhīro;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.7: paṭibalo hoti ubho atthapaccatthike assāsetuṃ saññāpetuṃ nijjhāpetuṃ pekkhetuṃ pasādetuṃ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.19.13: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ ubbāhikāya sammannituṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.2: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.4: Amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṃ sammanneyya ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.8: Amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne anantāni ceva bhassāni jāyanti, na cekassa bhāsitassa attho viññāyati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.9: Saṃgho itthannāmañca itthannāmañca bhikkhuṃ sammannati ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.10: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa ca itthannāmassa ca bhikkhuno sammuti ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.12: Sammato saṃghena itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca bhikkhu ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.20.13: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.21.1: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṃ, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.21.6: evaṃ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.1: Tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne tatrāssa bhikkhu dhammakathiko, tassa neva suttaṃ āgataṃ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.4: Imassa neva suttaṃ āgataṃ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.5: So atthaṃ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.6: Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.7: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū taṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.22.12: evaṃ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.1: Tehi ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchiyamāne tatrāssa bhikkhu dhammakathiko, tassa suttañhi kho āgataṃ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo, so atthaṃ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.4: Imassa suttañhi kho āgataṃ hoti, no suttavibhaṅgo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.5: So atthaṃ asallakkhento byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.6: Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.7: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū taṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametuṃ, idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.23.12: evaṃ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.1: Te ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na sakkonti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṃ, tehi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūhi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghassa niyyādetabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.2: ‘na mayaṃ, bhante, sakkoma imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ubbāhikāya vūpasametuṃ, saṃghova imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametū’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.3: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, evarūpaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ yebhuyyasikāya vūpasametuṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.5: yo na chandāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na dosāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na mohāgatiṃ gaccheyya, na bhayāgatiṃ gaccheyya, gahitāgahitañca jāneyya …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.7: Paṭhamaṃ bhikkhu yācitabbo, yācitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṃgho ñāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.9: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ salākaggāhāpakaṃ sammanneyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.13: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno salākaggāhāpakassa sammuti, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.16: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.18: Yathā bahutarā bhikkhū dhammavādino vadanti tathā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.25: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā na paṭikkosanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.28: Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.31: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, ubho atthapaccatthikā sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.34: Yā yebhuyyasikākammassa kiriyā karaṇaṃ upagamanaṃ ajjhupagamanaṃ adhivāsanā appaṭikkosanā—
pli-tv-kd14:14.24.36: Evaṃ vūpasantañce, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇaṃ kārako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ;
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā evaṃ jātaṃ evaṃ samuppannaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.4: assosuṃ kho amukasmiṃ kira āvāse sambahulā therā viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā paṇḍitā viyattā medhāvino lajjino kukkuccakā sikkhākāmā.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.5: Te ce therā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, evamidaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ suvūpasantaṃ assāti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā te there etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.7: “idaṃ, bhante, adhikaraṇaṃ evaṃ jātaṃ, evaṃ samuppannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.8: Sādhu, bhante, therā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamentu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, yathayidaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ suvūpasantaṃ assā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.10: yathā sāvatthiyā saṃghena adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ tathā suvūpasantanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.13: asantuṭṭhā sāvatthiyā saṃghassa adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā sambahulānaṃ therānaṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.14: assosuṃ kho amukasmiṃ kira āvāse tayo therā viharanti …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.16: eko thero viharati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.17: So ce thero imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyya dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, evamidaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ suvūpasantaṃ assāti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.18: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā taṃ theraṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.19: “idaṃ, bhante, adhikaraṇaṃ evaṃ jātaṃ, evaṃ samuppannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.20: Sādhu, bhante, thero imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametu dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena, yathayidaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ suvūpasantaṃ assā”ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.22: yathā sāvatthiyā saṃghena adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ, yathā sambahulehi therehi adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ, yathā tīhi therehi adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ, yathā dvīhi therehi adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamitaṃ, tathā suvūpasantanti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.25.24: Atha kho te bhikkhū asantuṭṭhā sāvatthiyā saṃghassa adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā sambahulānaṃ therānaṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā dvinnaṃ therānaṃ adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, asantuṭṭhā ekassa therassa adhikaraṇavūpasamanena, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.1: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saññattiyā tayo salākaggāhe—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.4: Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā salākāyo vaṇṇāvaṇṇāyo katvā ekameko bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.13: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, gūḷhako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.15: Tena salākaggāhāpakena bhikkhunā ekamekassa bhikkhuno upakaṇṇake ārocetabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.24: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sakaṇṇajappako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.26.28: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, vivaṭako salākaggāho hoti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.3: sammukhāvinayena ca, sativinayena ca, amūḷhavinayena ca, tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.10: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.11: Tassa kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayo dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.13: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā …pe…
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.16: Sohaṃ, bhante, sativepullappatto saṃghaṃ sativinayaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.21: Bhikkhū itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.23: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.26: Bhikkhū itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsenti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.28: Saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.29: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.33: Dinno saṃghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sativepullappattassa sativinayo.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.34: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.41: Yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati, ubho sammukhībhūtā honti—
pli-tv-kd14:14.27.44: Yā sativinayassa kammassa kiriyā karaṇaṃ upagamanaṃ ajjhupagamanaṃ adhivāsanā appaṭikkosanā—
